title: UTHealth Houston Half Marathon & 10k
blurb: Our biggest event of the year is the health fair that UT Physicians puts on during the packet pickup for the half marathon and 10k that UTHealth Houston sponsors. These health fairs require digital advertisements, event wayfinding, t-shirt design, and branded promotional items and games. I also was the designer who converted the raceâ€™s old logo to the new title sponsor logo and packaged out those files for the race group.
